objects.specification: A smooth light gray matte finish floor with subtle texture suitable for high foot traffic; extends across the entire booth area.
Tall vertical seamless white wall panels with a matte finish, providing a clean backdrop for displays; each wall extends from floor to ceiling and has no visible joints.
Tall vertical seamless white wall panels with a matte finish, providing a clean backdrop for displays; each wall extends from floor to ceiling and has no visible joints.
Tall vertical seamless white wall panels with a matte finish, providing a clean backdrop for displays; each wall extends from floor to ceiling and has no visible joints.

A sleek modern concept car model with aerodynamic curves, metallic deep red paint, glossy finish, black tinted windows, sporty alloy wheels with low-profile tires, and detailed LED headlights; designed for realistic presentation at auto shows.

A rectangular pedestal display stand made of dark gray powder-coated metal frame, with two staggered levels of transparent acrylic shelves, minimalistic design for brochure and accessory presentation; stable flat base and smooth edges.

A rectangular pedestal display stand made of dark gray powder-coated metal frame, with two staggered levels of transparent acrylic shelves, minimalistic design for brochure and accessory presentation; stable flat base and smooth edges.

A modern reception desk with warm wood veneer front panel inset within a dark brown matte metal frame, topped with a white matte countertop; includes integrated storage shelves on the backside and recessed toe kick; sized for two staff behind it.
A visitor chair with dark gray upholstered seat and backrest, supported by a sleek black powder-coated metal frame with four slender legs; ergonomic curvature for short-term seating.
A visitor chair with dark gray upholstered seat and backrest, supported by a sleek black powder-coated metal frame with four slender legs; ergonomic curvature for short-term seating.

A large vertical banner featuring the car brand logo and promotional graphics, made of high-resolution printed fabric with vibrant colors, hemmed edges, and discreet grommets for mounting; surface is semi-matte to reduce glare.

A large vertical banner featuring the car brand logo and promotional graphics, made of high-resolution printed fabric with vibrant colors, hemmed edges, and discreet grommets for mounting; surface is semi-matte to reduce glare.
A wide horizontal banner with vivid brand imagery and promotional text, printed on durable vinyl with hemmed edges, matte finish to minimize reflection; mounted flush against the wall.

A small cylindrical ceiling-mounted spotlight housing with white powder-coated metal finish and integrated LED module; directs a focused beam with adjustable angle to highlight center display; trimless flush mount.

A decorative potted plant with lush green broad leaves, arranged in a matte black cylindrical planter; realistic foliage texture and soil surface visible; planter has a rubber base pad.
